name: Sol'us - Marginally Guilty
description:
Complete the bunker projects and survive!

Left Click - Move to Cursor Position

Shift - Sprint

Q - Eat

W - Drink

E - Vacuum 

R - Purify Water

Space - Contribute Resources to Project

1 - Ping Closest Food

2 - Ping Closest Water

3 - Ping Closest Plastic

4 - Ping Closest Metal
